CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this area chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Vanguard Dynamics relative to NovaTech Solutions?
SRP.A: Vanguard Dynamics is {above} NovaTech Solutions in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total net profit margin?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Vanguard Dynamics}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total net profit margin?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {NovaTech Solutions}.

VE.Q: What is NovaTech Solutions's Net Profit Margin in 1967?
VE.A: NovaTech Solutions's net profit margin in 1967 is {12.98} %.

VE.Q: What is Vanguard Dynamics's Net Profit Margin in 1976?
VE.A: Vanguard Dynamics's net profit margin in 1976 is {23.60} %.

VE.Q: What is Vanguard Dynamics's Net Profit Margin in 1986?
VE.A: Vanguard Dynamics's net profit margin in 1986 is {30.84} %.

EVJ.Q: What is the global minimum Net Profit Margin in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global minimum net profit margin is {0.15} %.

EVJ.Q: What is the global maximum Net Profit Margin in the area chart?
EVJ.A: The global maximum net profit margin is {35.64} %.

EVJ.Q: What is the highest Net Profit Margin level recorded for NovaTech Solutions?
What is the lowest Net Profit Margin level recorded for NovaTech Solutions?
EVJ.A: NovaTech Solutions's lowest recorded level is approximately {0.15} % in {1982}.

SC.Q: What is the average total Net Profit Margin?
SC.A: The average total net profit margin is {30.19} %.

NF.Q: Which years did the total Net Profit Margin fall between 28.11 and 31.07 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Net Profit Margin go below 28.87 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.
Which years did the total Net Profit Margin exceed 30.32 %? Please list the years and corresponding total values.

NC.Q: Was the total Net Profit Margin in 1980 higher or lower than in 1991?
NC.A: The total net profit margin in 1980 was {lower} than in 1991.

NC.Q: Between 1973 and 1984, did the total Net Profit Margin experience a larger or smaller change than between 1967 and 1985?
NC.A: The change in total net profit margin between 1973 and 1984 was {smaller} than between 1967 and 1985.

NC.Q: Between 1981 and 1987, did the total Net Profit Margin experience a larger or smaller change than between 1977 and 1978?
NC.A: The change in total net profit margin between 1981 and 1987 was {larger} than between 1977 and 1978.

NC.Q: Between 1975 and 1979, was the average total Net Profit Margin higher or lower than between 1975 and 1976?
NC.A: The average total net profit margin between 1975 and 1979 was {lower} than between 1975 and 1976.

MSR.Q: Which series has the largest cumulative area in this area chart?
MSR.A: {Vanguard Dynamics} has the largest cumulative area.

VA.Q: To reduce the 'waving' visual effect in the area chart, reorder the layers by end value and list the labels from top to bottom after sorting.
VA.A: The reordered layer order from top to bottom is: {NovaTech Solutions, Vanguard Dynamics}.
